name: Shopify Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Shopify Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Shopify API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Shopify API | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiKey
available_options: Access Token (值: accessToken)
OAuth2 (值: oAuth2)
API Key (值: apiKey)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: order
available_options: Order (值: order)
Product (值: product)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a product
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a product
Get (值: get) - Get a product
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many products
Update (值: update) - Update a product
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: collection_id (值: None) - Filter results by product collection ID
created_at_max (值: None) - Show products created before date
created_at_min (值: None) - Show products created after date
fields (值: None) - Show only certain fields, specified by a comma-separated list of field names
handle (值: None) - Filter results by product handle
ids (值: None) - Return only products specified by a comma-separated list of product IDs
presentment_currencies (值: None) - Return presentment prices in only certain currencies, specified by a comma-separated list of ISO 4217 currency codes
product_type (值: None) - Filter results by product type
published_at_max (值: None) - Show products published before date
published_at_min (值: None) - Show products published after date
published_status (值: None) - Return products by their published status
title (值: None) - Filter results by product title
updated_at_max (值: None) - Show products last updated before date
updated_at_min (值: None) - Show products last updated after date
vendor (值: None) - Filter results by product vendor

limeItemsUi.name: limeItemsUi
limeItemsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Line Items | 默认值: {}
available_options: lineItemValues (值: None)

orderId.name: orderId
orderId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Order ID | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: attributionAppId (值: None) - Show orders attributed to a certain app, specified by the app ID. Set as current to show orders for the app currently consuming the API.
createdAtMin (值: None) - Show orders created at or after date
createdAtMax (值: None) - Show orders created at or before date
financialStatus (值: None) - Filter orders by their financial status
fulfillmentStatus (值: None) - Filter orders by their fulfillment status
fields (值: None) - Fields the orders will return, formatted as a string of comma-separated values. By default all the fields are returned.
ids (值: None) - Retrieve only orders specified by a comma-separated list of order IDs
processedAtMax (值: None) - Show orders imported at or before date
processedAtMin (值: None) - Show orders imported at or after date
status (值: None) - Filter orders by their status
sinceId (值: None) - Show orders after the specified ID
updatedAtMax (值: None) - Show orders last updated at or after date
updatedAtMin (值: None) - Show orders last updated at or before date

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: body_html (值: None) - A description of the product. Supports HTML formatting.
handle (值: None) - A unique human-friendly string for the product. Automatically generated from the product's title. Used by the Liquid templating language to refer to objects.
images (值: None) - A list of product image objects, each one representing an image associated with the product
productOptions (值: None) - The custom product property names like Size, Color, and Material. You can add up to 3 options of up to 255 characters each.
product_type (值: None) - A categorization for the product used for filtering and searching products
published_at (值: None) - The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the product was published. Can be set to null to unpublish the product from the Online Store channel.
published_scope (值: None)
tags (值: None) - A string of comma-separated tags that are used for filtering and search. A product can have up to 250 tags. Each tag can have up to 255 characters.

template_suffix (值: None) - The suffix of the Liquid template used for the product page. If this property is specified, then the product page uses a template called "product.suffix.liquid", where "suffix" is the value of this property. If this property is "" or null, then the product page uses the default template "product.liquid". (default: null)
title (值: None) - The name of the product
vendor (值: None) - The name of the product's vendor

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: The name of the product | (必填项)

productId.name: productId
productId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Product ID | (必填项)
